Source: Complete each of the achievements associated with the Black Sacrament contracts for the Speaker.
Aid Crafty Lerisa, Captain Jimila, Kireth and Raynor Vanos, Mel Adrys, Razum-dar, and Naryu Virian.
Assist Divayth Fyr in stopping the flood of animunculi coming from the Halls of Fabrication.
Restore Lord Vivec's lost power, save Vivec City, and be named Champion of Vivec.
Find all 30 ancestral tombs in Vvardenfell, and uncover the location of the lost Library of Andule.
Defeat the Wyrd Sisters, Aghaedh, Dagrund, Tarcyr, and Balorgh in March of Sacrifices.
Defeat Jailer Melitus, Hedge Maze Guardian, Mylenne, the Archivist, and Vykosa in Moon Hunter Keep.
Complete both Exiled Redoubt and Lep Seclusa in Normal.
Complete both Exiled Redoubt and Lep Seclusa in Veteran.
